page.shortlink: api a5 storage list items function
page.description: Gets a list of items in a storage container. You can optionally return objects that start with the specified searchPrefix

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: searchPrefix
argument.description: An optional search prefix. If specified, only items that begin with the search prefix will be returned.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: An optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the list of items. If a search prefix was specified, returns the list of items that begin with the search prefix.
